body.name: iPhone Fast Charger Cable,Fast Charger iPhone 20W PD USB C Wall Charger Type C Power Adapter Lightning Cable Fast Charging Plug Compatible with iPhone 14/13 Pro/12/11/XS/Max/XR/X/8 Plus/SE 2022,iPad
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 50 mins
features: [MFi Certified Lightning Cable] with the MFi chip,the usb c to lightning cord equips automatic chip recognition function,fully support with iOS versions.20w usb c charger offers multiple safeguards automatically. Multi-charging protection keeps your device safe from over-current,over-voltage over-heating and short-circuiting.

[Fast Wall Charger] 20w PD usb type c power delivery wall plug,PD3.0 adapter quick charge usb c port provides max 20w output power,charge your device up to 3X faster than the original 5w charger,fast charge your iPhone up to 50% in just 30 minutes,helps you work efficiently.

[Safe Efficient Fast Charging] the power delivery wall charger for iPhone owns a built-in multi-protection system to avoid over-voltage,over-charging,over-heat, etc.The smart chip including MFi certified lightning cable match current required by devices automatically, charges your iPhone/iPad device fast, safely, and steadily.Tangle-free 3.3 feet length is convenient for usage while charging and sync at home/office/travel in bed,hotel rooms,and more.

[Applicable devices] use official iPhone 13 lightning cable 20w usb c wall charger to access fast charging for iPhone 13/13 mini/13 Pro/13 Pro max/iPhone 12/12 mini/12 Pro/12 Pro max/Se 2020/11/11 Pro/11 Pro max/xs/xs max/xr/x/8 Plus,iPad,iPad Pro,iPad mini,iPad air.This power delivery 3.0 fast charger also charges for iPhone 7 6 Plus,iPhone 5 5c 5s Se Airpods at an original charging speed.
[What You Get] 1x3.3ft cable and 1x USB C wall charger.
body.description: Apple MFi Certified iPhone 20W PD USB C Power Fast ChargerFast Data Transfer & 3.0X Faster Charging:With this USB-C to Lightning Cable, you could transfer data from your iPhone/iPad directly, The speed of data transfer is up to 480 Mbps. Compared with 5W original charger, this 20W PD fast charger for iPhone could save more than 1.5 hour for you!20W Power Delivery Fast Charge Speed:iPhone 13/13 Mini/13 Pro/13 Pro MaxiPhone 12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro MaxiPhone SE/SE 2020/SE 2022iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro MaxiPhone X/XR/XS/XS MaxiPhone 8/8 PlusStandard Charge Speed:iPhone 7 7 Plus, 6 6 Plus, 6S 6S Plus, 5, 5C, 5S, SE, iPad /Pro/Air/Mini with lightning port, AirpodsComposition Materials:20W USB-C PD3.0 Fast ChargingMFi Certified ChipColor: WhiteCable Length: 3.3FTInput Voltage: 100-240V ~ 50-60Hz, 0.6AOutput Power: 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 9V/2.2AMaterial: TPE Flexible Cord Carbon + 100% Coppery CoreBulit in High-Tech Chip:The updated smart iQ chip in the USB-C power adapter protect your iPhone/iPad from overcurrent, over-voltage, short-circuit and overheating, improving the charging efficiency and security.Charge Your iPhone Everywhere:Compact size 20W PD wall charger paring with 3.3FT Type C to Lightning cable provide fast efficient charging at home, in bedroom, office, backseat of car and even travel anywhere, completely hassle-free.Heavy-Duty Durable Cable:iPhone fast charging cable is Extremely durable with built-in kevlar fiber for maximum strength. It could bring larger and stable current without damaging the device battery when charging.What You Can Get1 x 3.3ft USB C to Lightning Cable1 x 20W Type C PD Wall Charger Adapter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great just buy it
reviews.reviewText: It’s not cheap, it works and good quality too, it charges my phone pretty quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Long Cord is What I Need
reviews.reviewText: This charger is fast and is easily packed for travel. I need the long cord because if I am charging my smart phone at night, I am either reading on my Kindle or streaming a television program or movie. When I fall asleep the battery would discharge if I didn't have this long-cord charger, leaving me in a predicament in the morning. I actually use more than one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped charging after 1 week of use...poor quality
reviews.reviewText: Really disappointed...I know this is a cheap charger, but I expected at least a few months of use at least before it died out. Literally stopped working after 1 week of use. What a pain in the butt. When it comes to phone chargers, you have to pay for quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wish I had gotten a longer cord
